radiographic_examinations.findings: Intensely increased 18F-FDG uptake within the lesions from right adrenal (SUVmax 19.7, SUVaverage 11.9) and left kidney (SUVmax 9.4, SUVaverage 5.6).

Axial opposed-phase T1-weighted MRI showed no signal intensity loss, indicating no fat component within the 2 masses. Axial and coronal T2-SPIR MRI scans showed heterogeneous but predominantly hyperintense features in the 2 lesions.
